All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Athing
This class will handle all of the objects that will be presented in the game.
Direction
This Enum will simply change set the value of Eevee's dirction so if for example the player presses 'up' The picture of Eevee dirction will point up will rotate so it points up.
Display
This class will extend JPanel.
Eevee
This class will extend "Athing".
GameActions
This class will define the actions that can be made in the game.
House
This class will create an arraylist with the different levels that the user can travel in.
Imges
This class we create a hashmap that will store all of the images that will be graphicaly represented in the game.
input
This class will make use of "KeyListener" to detect any sort of input that the user makes on the keyboard.
Level
This class will do all of the things necessary to compile the levels correctly.
Main
This class is the main class and from this the user will run the game.
output
Using the pen and paper analogy from the documentation in "display" class we could extrapolate that analogy and say that this is what is drawn.
Text
This class will handle all of the messages that pop up during the game.
TheGame
This class makes use of "Actionlistener" which is responsible for handling all of the keys presses that the user press such as using one of the in-game components.
